medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent postprandial right upper quadrant pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 months ago and have become more frequent, now occurring almost after every meal. Associated symptoms include nausea, anorexia, and chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes, Hypertension, Hyperplastic colonic polyps/serous adenoma.
medical_history.family_history: Hypertension (mother), unspecified conditions in mother and brother.
